body:
A good friend of mine just said this is the definition of jelly
'Its Coloured shit that wobbles'
I want to know whats your definition of Jelly!!!!
body_tagged:
A good friend of mine just said this is the definition of jelly
'Its Coloured shit that wobbles'

title: A quick question

replies.body: I agree with your friend because Jelly is coloured shit that wobbles.
replies.body_tagged: I agree with your friend because Jelly is coloured shit that wobbles.

replies.body: The thing on the top corner left (right for you) of my head.
replies.body_tagged: The thing on the top corner left (right for you) of my head.

replies.body:
A sweet, clear, semisolid, somewhat elastic spread or preserve made from fruit juice and sugar boiled to a thick consistency.

Definition of Jelly* according to Google

replies.body: No one said jealous, really? K I guess I'm the first. :P

replies.body: A substance that allows the particles within it to slide over one another, similar to a liquid, but unlike a liquid does have a solid structure, so it will reform back into shape.
replies.body_tagged: A substance that allows the particles within it to slide over one another, similar to a liquid, but unlike a liquid does have a solid structure, so it will reform back into shape.
